General.Name: Lilium Equity Warrants
General.Description: Lilium N.V., a transportation company, focuses on the research and development of electric Vertical Takeoff and Landing (eVTOL) aircraft for use in high-speed air transport system for people and goods. It has a strategic commercial collaboration with Azul S.A. and Azul Linhas Aereas Brasileiras S.A. The company was founded in 2015 and is headquartered in Wessling, Germany.

2.Name: Mr. Sebastian  Born
2.Title: Co-Founder and Head of Structure & Interior
